author: snoopdave
msg: Dev branch for GSOC project

author: doogie
msg: FIX/OPTIMIZE: Do column-name munging once, and save the
output, instead of doing it each time the sql string is generated.  This
solidifies the definition of getColValue() and getColName().  colName is
the identifier used to refer to the column, it's generally what comes
after the AS keyword.  colValue is used to the left of AS, and in
CONDITION/ORDER BY/GROUP BY clauses.
This change should allow EntityFieldValue to be rewritten, so it doesn't
have the hack of having to deal with the entityAliasStack.  In theory,
it can just call getColName/getColValue(I'm not certain which is the
correct one for this case).
Also, EntityFieldValue should not have that hack at all, it should have
been put into a completely separate class.

author: doogie
msg: OPTIMIZE: Switch the database feature detection code to use a loop and a registry
of detectable features.  As a side effect, the output strings are now
aligned.

author: doogie
msg: FEATURE: Add support for webapp in ofbiz-component.xml that
has a null location.  Such a webapp will show up in the backend menus,
but no catalina/jetty webapp will be automatically created.

author: doogie
msg: FEATURE: Add relation ShipmentMethodType to entity ProductStoreShipmentMeth.
